content: if you loved the riverside slouch hat pattern then you will love the riverside headband earwarmer it is made with the gorgeous preciosa tonal yarn from knit picks and is available in 5 sizes from child small to adult large **materials ** * approximately 85 yds of category 4 medium/worsted weight yarn i used knit picks preciosa tonal in the pewter and kuma colorways * size j 6mm crochet hook * yarn needle for weaving ends * scissors
